post_content:
Price is net to me and delivered with tracking. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or on-going negotiations.

SGC 2.5 Steve Evans with an EPDG back. The Evans craze seems to be over but this is still a VERY difficult card to find in an off back. Currently one Tolstoi FS on eBay. 

Front is nice. Great color. 

PLEASE NOTE AT SOME POINT POST ENCAPSULATION A SMALL PIECE OF THE BACK FLAKED OFF AND YOU CAN SEE IT STILL IN THE HOLDER. 

I’m trying to price for what I think a 1.5 EPDG would go for. Common back 1.5’s seem to do about $115. 

$215 ***SOLD***

Thanks for looking!

[IMG]https://www.flickr.com/photo_download.gne?id=53340691088&secret=483362e43a&size=c&source=photoPageEngagement[/IMG]

Pm sent 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
